description: This file declares the interface for the Slap Object Container (OCO) component, including function prototypes for creation, removal, enrollment, and initialization of the OCO object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) system.

methods.name: SlapCreateObjContainer
methods.description: Creates and initializes an object container for SLAP, returning a handle to it.

methods.name: SlapOcoCreate
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Slap Object Container (OCO).

methods.name: SlapOcoRemove
methods.description: Removes and deallocates the OCO instance.

methods.name: SlapOcoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary objects within the OCO.
